original_text: The king of Nineveh heard about God's message. He got up from his throne and he removed his royal clothes. He dressed himself in sackcloth and he sat in ashes on the ground.
korean_text: 그 일이 니느웨 왕에게 들리매 왕이 보좌에서 일어나 왕복을 벗고 굵은 베 옷을 입고 재 위에 앉으니라

sentences.original_text: The king of Nineveh heard about God's message.
He got up from his throne
and he removed his royal clothes.
and he sat in ashes on the ground.
